name: Grand Stickman: Missions Gangt
description:
Grand Stickman: Missions Gangter is the grand theft game. Now to prove yourself that you are the real stick figure grand gangster in the city of sin. Prepare yourself to fight against the enemies. Reach to that specific location to meet other mafia stickman hero criminal. You are allowed to do the city criminal robbery and start the crime city gang wars.
Features:
- Grand stickman mafia simulator
- HD graphics with 3D open world environment
- Move around with the help of the map
- Upgrade heavy weapon arsenal to fight with other grand gangster
- Thug life simulator
